CustomField.description: The path to the field node, from the object key, in the JSON Redox data model, comma separated (i.e. "Empoyer,Address" for Guarantor Employer Address). If this value is an integer, it is assumed that the value is a list and it will take the 'n'th element. If the value says "concat", it will concatenate all entries in the list.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The path to the field node, from the object key, in the JSON Redox data model, comma separated (i.e. "Empoyer,Address" for Guarantor Employer Address). If this value is an integer, it is assumed that the value is a list and it will take the 'n'th element.
CustomField.label: Path
